question: Can a husband and wife have intercourse during ramadaan. Can they have intercourse after breaking fast and before sehri. Husband and wife will make ghusal before sehri, and before they start to fast.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
When they are not fasting, it is permissible for husband and wife to have intercourse.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
